Sample message in ISO 8583 format with ASCII encoding.

02003220000000808000000010000000001500120604120000000112340001840

Message Type: 0200
Bitmap: 3220000000808000
Data fields: 000010000000001500120604120000000112340001840

As JSON: {"11":"000001","3":"000010","4":"000000001500","49":"840","7":"1206041200","41":"12340001"}

Source: https://documentation.sas.com/doc/en/eopug/10.2/n036812ukh88hsn17er0setdhyhf.htm
